explains: adj. 有自杀倾向的；有致命危险的，极为冒险的；自取灭亡的，自我毁灭性的；可能造成大破坏（麻烦）的

sentences.en: He grew suicidal, thinking up ways to end it all.
sentences.cn: 他变得想自杀，想出了多种自杀方式。

sentences.en: He noted limitations to the study, such as the inability to determine the cause of the suicidal behavior.
sentences.cn: 他注意到这项研究的局限性，比如很难确定自杀行为原因。

sentences.en: Surprisingly, crying is more commonly associated with minor forms of depression than with major depression involving suicidal thoughts.
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的是，哭泣更多地与轻度抑郁症联系在一起，而不是与有自杀念头的重度抑郁症相关。
